fields.name: text
fields.description: The field for the text record component.

fields.name: lineWidth
fields.description: The field for the lineWidth record component.

fields.name: textOpacity
fields.description: The field for the textOpacity record component.

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.description: The field for the backgroundColor record component.

fields.name: flags
fields.description: The field for the flags record component.

constructors.name: TextRenderState
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a TextRenderState record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) ; primitive components are compared with '=='.

methods.name: text
methods.description: Returns the value of the text record component.

methods.name: lineWidth
methods.description: Returns the value of the lineWidth record component.

methods.name: textOpacity
methods.description: Returns the value of the textOpacity record component.

methods.name: backgroundColor
methods.description: Returns the value of the backgroundColor record component.

methods.name: flags
methods.description: Returns the value of the flags record component.
